meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bobbi Hiltibidal Shari Dwoskin Paul Nelson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6471.

td.p: Bobbi Hiltibidal, a retired paralegal from Topeka, Kansas
Shari Dwoskin, a law student originally from Montreal, Canada
Paul Nelson, a Senate staff aide originally from Iowa City, Iowa (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,000)

tr.td: AROUND THE FOREST
FUNNYMEN
CLOSE TO YOU
(Alex: We're gonna list some places for you, and you have to tell which one is closest to us as we stand here today in Southern California.)
MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS
RHYME SCHEME

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Though it sounds like what you eat on a pita, it\'s actually the dark organic material in soils found in some forest floors')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Though it sounds like what you eat on a pita, it's actually the dark organic material in soils found in some forest floors

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Paul
Shari
Bobbi
NEW YORK SENATORS
GHOST-POURRI
AFRICA
"A"DJECTIVES
BRITISH NOVELISTS
WHAT'S CHASING YOU?!
(Alex: We'll give you the title of the motion picture. You tell us what kind of creature or thing is chasing you in that film.)
